variable.name: If Navier-Stokes, kind of turbulent model
Conversion factor for converting the grid to meters
Reference length for pitching, rolling, and yawing momentum.

help.definition: FARFIELD (Boundary name, Mach, Pressure, Temperature, Flow Firection Vector)
help.otherdetails: You can set a boundary to Pressure Farfield condition. It could be repeated by other boundary names. The differences between this command and MARKER_FAR are that the details of the condition is must be provided through command but in MARKER_FAR they are entered by MACH_NUMBER,

variable.name: Marker of the surface which is going to be plotted or designed

help.values: File name with or without path
help.otherdetails: EXPORT_VTK_NAME. The name doesn't need .vtk extension since it will be added by the code.

help.definition: Generate VTK output file according to WRT_SOL_FREQ variable

variable.name: Automatically add the iteration no. to the filename

help.definition: In unsteady cases to keep all the intermediate results and make animations it is better to generate output with the iteration number.
order of magnitude with respect to the initial value
This property allows the user to focus on a part of the domain. This prevents the generation of the whole domain

variable.name: Time Step for dual time stepping simulations

Courant-Friedrichs-Lewy condition of the finest grid

help.values: (factor, number of iterations, CFL limit). Default value: (1.0,1000000.0,1.0)

min error of the linear solver for the implicit formulation

help.values: (0 = V cycle, 1 = W Cycle). Default value: 0

Damping factor for the residual restriction
Damping factor for the correction prolongation
Restart Multi-Grid cycle with the interpolated solution
Start up iterations using the fine grid
Reduction factor of the CFL coefficient on the coarse levels
Maximum number of children in the agglomeration stage
Maximum length of an agglomerated element (compared with the domain)
